channel.title: Tor Browser wont launch through whonix
channel.description:
I just started using Whonix (no Qubes) and unfortunately I am unable to access tor browser. Instead I get an error code. Updating does not work. Here is the script bug
BASH_COMMAND: cp --verbose --recursive --no-clobber "/var/cache/tb-binary/.cache" "$tb_user_home/" exit_code: 1 tb_browser_folder: /home/user/.tb/tor-browser tb_user_js_target_file: /home/user/.tb/tor-browser/Browser/TorBrowser/Data/Browser/profile.default/user.js output: /usr/lib/msgcollector/msgcollector output_opts: --icon /usr/share/icons/anon-icon-pack/tbupdate.ico --parentpid 1913 --identifier torbrowser --parenttty none --whoami user progressbaridx: bash -x torbrowser
Terminal error when trying to update tor browser: BASH_COMMAND: rm --recursive --force "$TEMP_DIR" exit_code: 1 Experts only: bash -x update-torbrowser
It tells me to wait and try again later. but days have passed and nothing has changed. please help

item.title: Tor Browser wont launch through whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Does https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#Permission_Fix help?

Please do not accidentally substitute Tor for a question related to Tor Browser, as this causes confusion.

Read full topic
item.source: Tor Browser wont launch through whonix

item.title: Tor Browser wont launch through whonix
item.dc:creator: clyxaune
item.description:
I just started using Whonix (no Qubes) and unfortunately I am unable to access tor browser. Instead I get an error code. Updating does not work. Here is the script bug

BASH_COMMAND: cp --verbose --recursive --no-clobber “/var/cache/tb-binary/.cache” “$tb_user_home/”
exit_code: 1
tb_browser_folder: /home/user/.tb/tor-browser
tb_user_js_target_file: /home/user/.tb/tor-browser/Browser/TorBrowser/Data/Browser/profile.default/user.js
output: /usr/lib/msgcollector/msgcollector
output_opts: --icon /usr/share/icons/anon-icon-pack/tbupdate.ico --parentpid 1913 --identifier torbrowser --parenttty none --whoami user
progressbaridx:
bash -x torbrowser

Terminal error when trying to update tor browser:
BASH_COMMAND: rm --recursive --force “$TEMP_DIR”
exit_code: 1
Experts only:
bash -x update-torbrowser

It tells me to wait and try again later. but days have passed and nothing has changed. please help

Read full topic
item.source: Tor Browser wont launch through whonix
